tinydblogging module¶

tinydblogging.log_msg(log_file, script, msg)¶

Send logging to ./log/log_file file the message adding userID who executed the task.

Parameters

  • log_file – logging file name

  • script – script name who is sending the message to log

  • msg – message to store

Returns

nothing

tinydblogging.main()¶
